title: Bloomberg Markets: Target Sales Bump Gives Hope for Comeback
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Target Sales Bump Gives Hope for Comeback
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Seema Shah Consumer Discretionary Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Target saying that sales would likely increase this quarter, reversing an earlier forecast for a decline.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
